statements.statement:
select t2.QCName, t3.SampleType, t3.ProjectName, t2.LotNum, t2.Pos, t3.TargetMean, t2.HorizonLevel, t3.TargetSD, t2.Manufacturer, t1.ConcResult, t1.SampleCreateTime from QualityControlResultTb t1 left join QualityControlTb t2 on t1.QCID = t2.QCID left join QCRelationProjectTb t3 on t1.QCID = t3.QCID and t1.ProjectName = t3.ProjectName and t1.SampleType = t3.SampleType
t2.QCName=#QCName#
t3.ProjectName=#ProjectName#
t2.LotNum=#LotNum#
t1.IsLogicalDelete=#IsLogicalDelete#
t1.IsLogicalEdit=#IsLogicalEdit#
t1.SampleCreateTime between #QCTimeStartTS# and #QCTimeEndTS# order by t1.SampleCreateTime desc

select t2.QCName, t3.SampleType, t3.ProjectName, t2.LotNum, t2.Pos, t3.TargetMean, t2.HorizonLevel, t3.TargetSD, t2.Manufacturer, t1.ConcResult, t1.SampleCreateTime from QualityControlResultForUserTb t1 left join QualityControlTb t2 on t1.QCID = t2.QCID left join QCRelationProjectTb t3 on t1.QCID = t3.QCID and t1.ProjectName = t3.ProjectName and t1.SampleType = t3.SampleType
t2.QCName=#QCName#
t3.ProjectName=#ProjectName#
t2.LotNum=#LotNum#
t1.IsLogicalDelete=#IsLogicalDelete#
t1.IsLogicalEdit=#IsLogicalEdit#
t1.SampleCreateTime between #QCTimeStartTS# and #QCTimeEndTS# order by t1.SampleCreateTime desc
insert into QualityControlResultTb (SampleNum, ProjectName, SampleType, QCID,SampleCreateTime) values(#SampleNum#,#ProjectName#,#SampleType#,#QCID#,#SampleCreateTime#)
Insert into QualityControlResultForUserTb (SampleNum, ProjectName, SampleType, QCID, ConcResult, SampleCreateTime) values (#SampleNum#, #ProjectName#, #SampleType#, #QCID#, #ConcResult#, #StartTime#)
update QualityControlResultTb set IsLogicalEdit = 1 where ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType# and QCID=#QCID# and SampleCreateTime=#StartTime# and IsLogicalEdit = 0
update QualityControlResultForUserTb set IsLogicalEdit = 1 where ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType# and QCID=#QCID# and SampleCreateTime=#StartTime# and IsLogicalEdit=0

select count(*) from QualityControlResultTb where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType# and QCID=#QCID# and SampleCreateTime between #StateTime# and #EndTime#
select SampleNum from QualityControlResultTb where ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType# and QCID=#QCID# and SampleCreateTime=#StartTime#
select count(*) from QualityControlResultTb where ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType# and QCID=#QCID# and SampleCreateTime=#StartTime# and IsLogicalDelete=0 and IsLogicalEdit=0

select count(*) from QualityControlResultForUserTb where ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType# and QCID=#QCID# and SampleCreateTime=#StartTime# and IsLogicalDelete=0 and IsLogicalEdit=0
update QualityControlResultTb set IsLogicalDelete = 1 where ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType# and QCID=#QCID# and SampleCreateTime=#StartTime# and IsLogicalDelete=0
update QualityControlResultForUserTb set IsLogicalDelete = 1 where ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType# and QCID=#QCID# and SampleCreateTime=#StartTime# and IsLogicalDelete=0

select t2.HorizonLevel,t1.SampleCreateTime,t1.ConcResult,t3.TargetMean,t3.TargetSD from QualityControlResultTb t1 left join QualityControlTb t2 on t1.QCID = t2.QCID left join QCRelationProjectTb t3 on t1.QCID = t3.QCID and t1.ProjectName = t3.ProjectName and t1.SampleType = t3.SampleType where t2.QCName=#QCName# and t3.ProjectName=#ProjectName# and t1.ProjectName=#ProjectName# and t1.IsLogicalDelete=0 and t1.IsLogicalEdit=0 and t1.AbsValue!='' and t1.ConcResult!='' and t1.SampleCreateTime between #QCTimeStartTS# and #QCTimeEndTS# union select t2.HorizonLevel,t1.SampleCreateTime,t1.ConcResult,t3.TargetMean,t3.TargetSD from QualityControlResultForUserTb t1 left join QualityControlTb t2 on t1.QCID = t2.QCID left join QCRelationProjectTb t3 on t1.QCID = t3.QCID and t1.ProjectName = t3.ProjectName and t1.SampleType = t3.SampleType where t2.QCName=#QCName# and t3.ProjectName=#ProjectName# and t1.ProjectName=#ProjectName# and t1.IsLogicalDelete=0 and t1.IsLogicalEdit=0 and t1.SampleCreateTime between #QCTimeStartTS# and #QCTimeEndTS#
select * from QualityControlResultTb where TCNO=#TCNO# and SampleCreateTime between #StartTime# and #EndTime#

update QualityControlResultTb set AbsValue=#AbsValue#,ConcResult=#ConcResult# where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType# and TCNO=#TCNO# and SampleCreateTime=#SampleCreateTime#
update QualityControlResultTb set Remarks=#Remarks# where SampleNum=#SampleNum# and ProjectName=#ProjectName# and TCNO=#TCNO# and SampleCreateTime=#SampleCreateTime#
select TCNO from QualityControlResultTb where ProjectName=#ProjectName# and SampleType=#SampleType# and SampleCreateTime=#SampleCreateTime#
